<a id="InputEventMouse"></a>

# InputEventMouse

**Inherits:** [InputEventWithModifiers](InputEventWithModifiers.md) **\<** [InputEventFromWindow](InputEventFromWindow.md) **\<** [InputEvent](InputEvent.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [InputEventMouseButton](InputEventMouseButton.md), [InputEventMouseMotion](InputEventMouseMotion.md)

Base input event type for mouse events.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Stores general information about mouse events.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Using InputEvent](../tutorials/inputs/inputevent.md)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="InputEventMouse_property_button_mask"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

**BitField**\[[MouseButtonMask](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_MouseButtonMask)\] **button_mask** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#InputEventMouse_property_button_mask)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_button_mask**\ (\ value\: **BitField**\[[MouseButtonMask](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_MouseButtonMask)\]\ )
- **BitField**\[[MouseButtonMask](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_MouseButtonMask)\] **get_button_mask**\ (\ )

The mouse button mask identifier, one of or a bitwise combination of the [MouseButton](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_MouseButton) button masks.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputEventMouse_property_global_position"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **global_position** = `Vector2(0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#InputEventMouse_property_global_position)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_global_position**\ (\ value\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ )
- [Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_global_position**\ (\ )

When received in [Node._input()](Node.md#Node_private_method__input) or [Node._unhandled_input()](Node.md#Node_private_method__unhandled_input), returns the mouse's position in the root [Viewport](Viewport.md) using the coordinate system of the root [Viewport](Viewport.md).

When received in [Control._gui_input()](Control.md#Control_private_method__gui_input), returns the mouse's position in the [CanvasLayer](CanvasLayer.md) that the [Control](Control.md) is in using the coordinate system of the [CanvasLayer](CanvasLayer.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="InputEventMouse_property_position"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **position** = `Vector2(0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#InputEventMouse_property_position)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_position**\ (\ value\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ )
- [Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_position**\ (\ )

When received in [Node._input()](Node.md#Node_private_method__input) or [Node._unhandled_input()](Node.md#Node_private_method__unhandled_input), returns the mouse's position in the [Viewport](Viewport.md) this [Node](Node.md) is in using the coordinate system of this [Viewport](Viewport.md).

When received in [Control._gui_input()](Control.md#Control_private_method__gui_input), returns the mouse's position in the [Control](Control.md) using the local coordinate system of the [Control](Control.md).
